content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":238872,"originalJapaneseLine":"　司会のお姉さん兼その他もろもろ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The host lady, who also handles various other roles,"},{"lineNumber":238873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シュリお姉さんでーす」","translatedEnglishLine":"is Sister Shuri!"},{"lineNumber":238874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「解説のコパンドンお姉さんやで〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is Sister Copandon, your commentator~"},{"lineNumber":238875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この闘神ダイジェストも","translatedEnglishLine":"This God of Fighting digest,"},{"lineNumber":238876,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残り回数が少なくなってきました。","translatedEnglishLine":"has only a few episodes left."},{"lineNumber":238877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寂しいですね、よよよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s sad, isn’t it, yo yo yo..."},{"lineNumber":238878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せやねー。","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right."},{"lineNumber":238879,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決勝の後はすぐ帰る人も多いから、","translatedEnglishLine":"After the finals, many people leave immediately,"},{"lineNumber":238880,"originalJapaneseLine":"　番組を見るのは今日が最後って人も多いやろな」","translatedEnglishLine":"so there are probably many watching the show for the last time today."},{"lineNumber":238881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、闘神ダイジェストを見るのは","translatedEnglishLine":"So, for those watching this God of Fighting digest"},{"lineNumber":238882,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これが最後という人の為にも、","translatedEnglishLine":"for whom this is the last time,"},{"lineNumber":238883,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元気にお送りしますよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we’ll bring it to you with energy!"},{"lineNumber":238884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、本日はカオス広場で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, today at Chaos Square,"},{"lineNumber":238885,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遂にカオスの持ち主が決定されました」","translatedEnglishLine":"the owner of Chaos has finally been decided."},{"lineNumber":238886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは明日の決勝に参戦される、","translatedEnglishLine":"That is none other than the contestant in tomorrow’s finals,"},{"lineNumber":238887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞・モフス選手です」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell Mofus."},{"lineNumber":238888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありゃあ、ビックリやったね〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow, that was surprising~"},{"lineNumber":238889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、まさか本当に","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, I really didn't expect"},{"lineNumber":238890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　持ち主が出てくるとは思いませんでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"the actual owner to show up."},{"lineNumber":238891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、カオスの件に関しては","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, regarding Chaos,"},{"lineNumber":238892,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昼間の放送で伝えたので、","translatedEnglishLine":"we covered it in the broadcast earlier today,"},{"lineNumber":238893,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はその後に起きた事件を","translatedEnglishLine":"so today we’ll cover the incident that happened afterward."},{"lineNumber":238894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「明日で遂に決勝を迎える闘神大会。","translatedEnglishLine":"The God of Fighting tournament finally reaches the finals tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":238895,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お祭り騒ぎも本日が最後ということで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since today is the last day of the festival frenzy,"},{"lineNumber":238896,"originalJapaneseLine":"　街もすごい賑わいでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"the city was very lively."},{"lineNumber":238897,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、コロシアムでは、","translatedEnglishLine":"And at the Colosseum,"},{"lineNumber":238898,"originalJapaneseLine":"　試合がない代わりに毎年恒例のショー……","translatedEnglishLine":"instead of matches, there was the annual show..."},{"lineNumber":238899,"originalJapaneseLine":"　の、予定だったのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that had been planned..."},{"lineNumber":238900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、そこで大事件や」","translatedEnglishLine":"But then, a huge incident occurred."},{"lineNumber":238901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なな、なんと、コロシアムに","translatedEnglishLine":"W-w-wonder of wonders, at the Colosseum,"},{"lineNumber":238902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゴールデンハニーがずしーんと乱入！","translatedEnglishLine":"Golden Honey made a dramatic intrusion!"},{"lineNumber":238903,"originalJapaneseLine":"　観客もパニックでした！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The spectators were panicked!"},{"lineNumber":238904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、それに大会出場者である","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, the tournament participants,"},{"lineNumber":238905,"originalJapaneseLine":"　選手の皆さんが集団で戦うという","translatedEnglishLine":"all fought together against her in a group,"},{"lineNumber":238906,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大事件に発展いたしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"leading to a major incident."},{"lineNumber":238907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まず、ザンスさんが高笑いしながら突進。","translatedEnglishLine":"First, Zans charged forward with a loud laugh."},{"lineNumber":238908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　得意の必殺技バイ・ラ・ウェイが炸裂","translatedEnglishLine":"His signature finishing move, Bye La Way, exploded."},{"lineNumber":238909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういうときはホンマ頼りになるやっちゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"At times like this, he's really someone you can count on."},{"lineNumber":238910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怯んだところをレリコフさんとヒーローさん、","translatedEnglishLine":"While she was staggered, Mr. Rerikov and Hero-san,"},{"lineNumber":238911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全裸王バファムーンさん、","translatedEnglishLine":"the Naked King Bafamoon,"},{"lineNumber":238912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　北条早雲さんなどが続きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"and Hojo Soun, among others, followed up."},{"lineNumber":238913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「古代兵器である桜花さんも最初に出て来た時は、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Ouka-san, the ancient weapon, first appeared,"},{"lineNumber":238914,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我、人間、殲滅……我、目標、殲滅……","translatedEnglishLine":"she kept saying, 'I, humans, annihilate... I, target, annihilate...'"},{"lineNumber":238915,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ばっかり言ってたくせに」","translatedEnglishLine":"all the time."},{"lineNumber":238916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我、人間、友……我、人間、守護……","translatedEnglishLine":"But now, she says things like, 'I, humans, friend... I, humans, protector...'"},{"lineNumber":238917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、なんか良いロボになって加勢します」","translatedEnglishLine":"and she’s become some kind of good robot helping them out."},{"lineNumber":238918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何があったんやこの子……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened to this girl...?"},{"lineNumber":238919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、ここで四天王の皆さんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"And here, the Four Heavenly Kings,"},{"lineNumber":238920,"originalJapaneseLine":"　超最強必殺スペシャル合体技を繰り出します」","translatedEnglishLine":"unleashed their super strongest special combined finishing move."},{"lineNumber":238921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一回戦敗退した汚名返上いうところかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Looks like they’re trying to redeem themselves from the first round defeat."},{"lineNumber":238922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「乱義さんは弓矢で援護射撃しつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mr. Rangi supported with arrow fire,"},{"lineNumber":238923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　選手の皆に的確な指示を送り、","translatedEnglishLine":"and gave precise instructions to the other fighters,"},{"lineNumber":238924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆も思わず素直にそれを聞きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"and everyone honestly listened to him without hesitation."},{"lineNumber":238925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この辺はさすがやね」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s really impressive."},{"lineNumber":238926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「IQ8億のイカマン、この世全ての知さんは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The squid man with an IQ of 800 million, Mr. All-Knowledge in this world,"},{"lineNumber":238927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愚かなヒューマンが！　愚かなヒューマンが！","translatedEnglishLine":"kept yelling 'Foolish humans! Foolish humans!'"},{"lineNumber":238928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　となんか怒ってました」","translatedEnglishLine":"He seemed quite angry."},{"lineNumber":238929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その隣では近くで見物しに来たミラクルさんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Next to him, Miracle-san came to watch nearby,"},{"lineNumber":238930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　椅子から転げ落ちる勢いで馬鹿笑い。","translatedEnglishLine":"laughing so hard he almost fell from his chair."},{"lineNumber":238931,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すっごく楽しそうでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"He looked like he was having a great time."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司会のお姉さん兼その他もろもろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The host lady, who also handles various other roles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリお姉さんでーす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Sister Shuri!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「解説のコパンドンお姉さんやで〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is Sister Copandon, your commentator~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この闘神ダイジェストも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This God of Fighting digest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残り回数が少なくなってきました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has only a few episodes left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しいですね、よよよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s sad, isn’t it, yo yo yo...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決勝の後はすぐ帰る人も多いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the finals, many people leave immediately,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番組を見るのは今日が最後って人も多いやろな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so there are probably many watching the show for the last time today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、闘神ダイジェストを見るのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, for those watching this God of Fighting digest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最後という人の為にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for whom this is the last time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元気にお送りしますよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we’ll bring it to you with energy!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、本日はカオス広場で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, today at Chaos Square,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にカオスの持ち主が決定されました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the owner of Chaos has finally been decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは明日の決勝に参戦される、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is none other than the contestant in tomorrow’s finals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフス選手です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell Mofus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありゃあ、ビックリやったね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, that was surprising~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、まさか本当に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, I really didn't expect

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ち主が出てくるとは思いませんでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the actual owner to show up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、カオスの件に関しては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, regarding Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間の放送で伝えたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we covered it in the broadcast earlier today,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はその後に起きた事件を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so today we’ll cover the incident that happened afterward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日で遂に決勝を迎える闘神大会。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The God of Fighting tournament finally reaches the finals tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お祭り騒ぎも本日が最後ということで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since today is the last day of the festival frenzy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街もすごい賑わいでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the city was very lively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、コロシアムでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And at the Colosseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試合がない代わりに毎年恒例のショー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: instead of matches, there was the annual show...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の、予定だったのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that had been planned...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、そこで大事件や」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But then, a huge incident occurred.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なな、なんと、コロシアムに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-w-wonder of wonders, at the Colosseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴールデンハニーがずしーんと乱入！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Golden Honey made a dramatic intrusion!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 観客もパニックでした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The spectators were panicked!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、それに大会出場者である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, the tournament participants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選手の皆さんが集団で戦うという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all fought together against her in a group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事件に発展いたしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading to a major incident.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、ザンスさんが高笑いしながら突進。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, Zans charged forward with a loud laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得意の必殺技バイ・ラ・ウェイが炸裂
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His signature finishing move, Bye La Way, exploded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういうときはホンマ頼りになるやっちゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At times like this, he's really someone you can count on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怯んだところをレリコフさんとヒーローさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While she was staggered, Mr. Rerikov and Hero-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全裸王バファムーンさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Naked King Bafamoon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲さんなどが続きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Hojo Soun, among others, followed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「古代兵器である桜花さんも最初に出て来た時は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Ouka-san, the ancient weapon, first appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我、人間、殲滅……我、目標、殲滅……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she kept saying, 'I, humans, annihilate... I, target, annihilate...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばっかり言ってたくせに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我、人間、友……我、人間、守護……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now, she says things like, 'I, humans, friend... I, humans, protector...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、なんか良いロボになって加勢します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she’s become some kind of good robot helping them out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何があったんやこの子……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to this girl...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、ここで四天王の皆さんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And here, the Four Heavenly Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超最強必殺スペシャル合体技を繰り出します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: unleashed their super strongest special combined finishing move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一回戦敗退した汚名返上いうところかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like they’re trying to redeem themselves from the first round defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義さんは弓矢で援護射撃しつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. Rangi supported with arrow fire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選手の皆に的確な指示を送り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gave precise instructions to the other fighters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆も思わず素直にそれを聞きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and everyone honestly listened to him without hesitation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この辺はさすがやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s really impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「IQ8億のイカマン、この世全ての知さんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The squid man with an IQ of 800 million, Mr. All-Knowledge in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愚かなヒューマンが！　愚かなヒューマンが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kept yelling 'Foolish humans! Foolish humans!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: となんか怒ってました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed quite angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その隣では近くで見物しに来たミラクルさんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to him, Miracle-san came to watch nearby,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 椅子から転げ落ちる勢いで馬鹿笑い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: laughing so hard he almost fell from his chair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっごく楽しそうでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looked like he was having a great time.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Foolish humans!'"},{"lineNumber":238928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　となんか怒ってました」","translatedEnglishLine":"He seemed quite angry."},{"lineNumber":238929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その隣では近くで見物しに来たミラクルさんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Next to him, Miracle-san came to watch nearby,"},{"lineNumber":238930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　椅子から転げ落ちる勢いで馬鹿笑い。","translatedEnglishLine":"laughing so hard he almost fell from his chair."},{"lineNumber":238931,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すっごく楽しそうでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"He looked like he was having a great time."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司会のお姉さん兼その他もろもろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The host lady, who also handles various other roles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シュリお姉さんでーす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Sister Shuri!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「解説のコパンドンお姉さんやで〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is Sister Copandon, your commentator~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この闘神ダイジェストも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This God of Fighting digest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残り回数が少なくなってきました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: has only a few episodes left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しいですね、よよよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s sad, isn’t it, yo yo yo...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決勝の後はすぐ帰る人も多いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the finals, many people leave immediately,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 番組を見るのは今日が最後って人も多いやろな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so there are probably many watching the show for the last time today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、闘神ダイジェストを見るのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, for those watching this God of Fighting digest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最後という人の為にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for whom this is the last time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元気にお送りしますよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we’ll bring it to you with energy!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、本日はカオス広場で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, today at Chaos Square,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にカオスの持ち主が決定されました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the owner of Chaos has finally been decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは明日の決勝に参戦される、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is none other than the contestant in tomorrow’s finals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞・モフス選手です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell Mofus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありゃあ、ビックリやったね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, that was surprising~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、まさか本当に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, I really didn't expect

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ち主が出てくるとは思いませんでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the actual owner to show up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、カオスの件に関しては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, regarding Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間の放送で伝えたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we covered it in the broadcast earlier today,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はその後に起きた事件を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so today we’ll cover the incident that happened afterward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日で遂に決勝を迎える闘神大会。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The God of Fighting tournament finally reaches the finals tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お祭り騒ぎも本日が最後ということで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since today is the last day of the festival frenzy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街もすごい賑わいでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the city was very lively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、コロシアムでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And at the Colosseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試合がない代わりに毎年恒例のショー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: instead of matches, there was the annual show...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の、予定だったのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that had been planned...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、そこで大事件や」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But then, a huge incident occurred.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なな、なんと、コロシアムに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-w-wonder of wonders, at the Colosseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴールデンハニーがずしーんと乱入！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Golden Honey made a dramatic intrusion!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 観客もパニックでした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The spectators were panicked!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、それに大会出場者である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, the tournament participants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選手の皆さんが集団で戦うという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all fought together against her in a group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大事件に発展いたしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leading to a major incident.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、ザンスさんが高笑いしながら突進。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, Zans charged forward with a loud laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 得意の必殺技バイ・ラ・ウェイが炸裂
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His signature finishing move, Bye La Way, exploded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういうときはホンマ頼りになるやっちゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At times like this, he's really someone you can count on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怯んだところをレリコフさんとヒーローさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While she was staggered, Mr. Rerikov and Hero-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全裸王バファムーンさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Naked King Bafamoon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲さんなどが続きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Hojo Soun, among others, followed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「古代兵器である桜花さんも最初に出て来た時は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Ouka-san, the ancient weapon, first appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我、人間、殲滅……我、目標、殲滅……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she kept saying, 'I, humans, annihilate... I, target, annihilate...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばっかり言ってたくせに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我、人間、友……我、人間、守護……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now, she says things like, 'I, humans, friend... I, humans, protector...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、なんか良いロボになって加勢します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she’s become some kind of good robot helping them out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何があったんやこの子……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened to this girl...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、ここで四天王の皆さんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And here, the Four Heavenly Kings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 超最強必殺スペシャル合体技を繰り出します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: unleashed their super strongest special combined finishing move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一回戦敗退した汚名返上いうところかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like they’re trying to redeem themselves from the first round defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義さんは弓矢で援護射撃しつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. Rangi supported with arrow fire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選手の皆に的確な指示を送り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gave precise instructions to the other fighters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆も思わず素直にそれを聞きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and everyone honestly listened to him without hesitation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この辺はさすがやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s really impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「IQ8億のイカマン、この世全ての知さんは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The squid man with an IQ of 800 million, Mr. All-Knowledge in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愚かなヒューマンが！　愚かなヒューマンが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: kept yelling 'Foolish humans! Foolish humans!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: となんか怒ってました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed quite angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その隣では近くで見物しに来たミラクルさんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to him, Miracle-san came to watch nearby,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 椅子から転げ落ちる勢いで馬鹿笑い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: laughing so hard he almost fell from his chair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっごく楽しそうでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He looked like he was having a great time.
